newsitem.title: USA: Zapata faces suit related to share offer.
newsitem.headline: Zapata faces suit related to share offer.

text.p: Zapata Corp said Friday it and its directors faced a lawsuit that sought injunctive relief against its pending tender offer for up to 15 million shares of its common stock.
It said the Hawley Opportunity Fund filed the lawsuit in the Court of Chancery of Delaware, alleging that the offer was unfair.

"(The suit also alleged that the offer's) documents failed to disclose material facts concerning pending patent litigation to which Envirodyne Industries, Inc. ( ) is the plaintiff and concerning the company's investment in oil and gas assets in Bolivia," it said.
Zapata, which owns about 40 percent of the outstanding common stock in Envirodyne, said it will respond to the litigation after completing its review of the complaint.
